alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kane County through 430 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Henrieville, or 32 miles southwest of Escalante, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Kane County. This includes US Route 89 near mile marker 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
